info.title: Voice Monkey
info.description: Voice Monkey provides you with an API to trigger Alexa Routines remotely.

get.description: Trigger a voice monkey routine to run an Alexa routine remotely.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Sign in to your account or open your welcome email to find your Voice Monkey access token.

parameters.name: monkey
parameters.description: This is the ID of the Monkey you want to trigger.

parameters.name: announcement
parameters.description: If you want your Alexa device to speak something out loud when you trigger your monkey then add the text to this parameter. You must open the Voice Monkey Skill as the last step of your routine.

parameters.name: voice
parameters.description: Leave empty to use default Alexa voice or select from one of the many different voices for your announcement.

parameters.name: notification
parameters.description: You can optionally send a notification to Alexa. The ‘announcement’ parameter must not be blank.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: You can send an image to alexa devices with a screen including the Echo Show. The ‘announcement’ parameter must not be blank. You must open the Voice Monkey Skill as the last step of your routine.

parameters.name: video
parameters.description: You can send a video to alexa devices with a screen including the Echo Show. The ‘announcement’ parameter must not be blank. You must open the Voice Monkey Skill as the last step of your routine.

parameters.name: websiteUrl
parameters.description: Open a website on your screen enabled Alexa. The ‘announcement’ parameter must not be blank. You must open the Voice Monkey Skill as the last step of your routine.
